name: MarionetteAI
description:
MarionetteAI is a tactical battle game where you build an AI for your characters.
The AI you make will be shared with all players. Players can use their AI to battle against the AI of other players.features・Intuitive interface for building a personal and strategic AI.
・Official monthly tournament published in a video.rules and How to PlayYou Battle Using Four Chess-like Pieces.
To win, you have to defeat either the opponent King or a set number of opponent pieces.

There are six types of Characters, each with unique abilities.
When to attack, when to defend... The difference in tactics and timings in each player decides the battle.
